dcterms:description: A dataset containing information on 2.7 million police stops of pedestrians in New York City between 2008 and 2012, used to analyze racial disparities in police stops.
dcterms:title: Police Stops in New York City (2008-2012)

dcterms:creator: E. Pierson

C. Phillips
S. Goel
dcterms:description: A national dataset of traffic stops used to analyze racial disparities in police stops across the United States.
dcterms:title: National Traffic Stop Database

dcterms:creator: E. Pierson
C. Simoiu
J. Overgoor
S. Corbett-Davies
V. Ramachandran
C. Phillips
S. Goel
dcterms:description: Data from the stop-and-frisk practice in New York City, containing information on pedestrian stops, including race, precinct, and search outcomes.
dcterms:title: Stop-and-Frisk Data
